name: Bow Headband - Yellow and White
description:
Bows are a hot trend right now for girls/women of all ages!

This 2-toned headband features a double layered bow that is adjustable. The larger bow on the bottom is solid yellow, top bow is yellow and white. You can slide the bow along the band to position it exactly where you want it to be. You can also tie the band around a ponytail or bun so the bow is an accent!

This item is made of 100% cotton yarn and is ready to be shipped to you! If you like this but would prefer it in another colour, please convo me! I'd be happy to do a custom order for you!

name: Bold Crochet Earrings - Grey
description:
Make a bold statement with this pair of crochet earrings! Made using acrylic yarn in two shades of grey, these earrings are a stunning accessory! Perfect for jazzing up a cute outfit and adding spunk to an updo, short or long hairstyle.

These earrings are 3.5 inches in diameter and hang from a silver-toned ear wire.

Like these but prefer a different colour? No problem, just contact me with your custom order request! :)

**FREE SHIPPING WITHIN THE CONTINENTAL U.S.**

name: Bold Crochet Earrings - Pink and Green
description:
I love the way pink and green look together! A perfect color combination for making a bold statement this Spring and Summer! This pair of earrings is made using 100% cotton yarn. Perfect for jazzing up a cute outfit and adding spunk to an updo, short or long hairstyle. 

These earrings are 3.5 inches in diameter and hang from a silver-toned ear wire.

Like these but prefer a different colour? No problem, just contact me with your custom order request! :)

**FREE SHIPPING WITHIN THE CONTINENTAL U.S.**

name: Crochet Halter Top - Made to Order
description:
This sexy crocheted halter top was made following a great pattern by the Double Stitch Twins!

The halter pictured was made in yellow, turquoise and orange and ties around the back of the neck and in the back. The back ties can be tied once where they lay or laced like a corset as pictured. Looks great over a tank top, tube top, or simple tee with jeans and makes a great and affordable fashion statement!

Custom orders welcomed - just convo me with the size (Small, Medium, or Large) and colour(s) desired before purchasing.

name: Crochet Tunic/Cover-Up - Made to Order
description:
Stay cool this Summer with this HOT tunic! Designed by the Double Stitch Twins, this tunic is a versatile, sexy, and trendy top that goes well over a tank top, tube top, form fitting dress, and looks great over a swimsuit. The front is the back and the back is the front because this cover up can be worn either way!

The tunic pictured was made using 3 different colors: hot pink, white, and grey with the colors done in the reverse on the other side.

This cover up tunic is ONE SIZE FITS MOST and includes ties on either side that can be tied behind your back for a more form fitting look (as seen in pictures 3 and 5). You may choose to tie the front panel or both, depending on your preference. Otherwise, you can let the ties hang down to the side for a more relaxed look.

Easy care instructions: Hand or machine wash in cold water. Remove excess water with a towel and lay flat to dry.

This item is MADE TO ORDER just for you! When placing your order, please specify your desired color(s) in the notes section. Feel free to contact me with any questions!

Please allow 7 to 10 days for item to be made and shipped.

**FREE SHIPPING WITHIN THE CONTINENTAL U.S.**
